name: itemHeadingLevel
description: The heading level which represents an element from `<h1>` through to `<h6>` for each of the file item titles.

name: items
description: The list of files to display.

params.name: id
params.description: A unique ID for the file item.

params.name: title
params.description: The name of the file to show.

params.name: fileType
params.description: A short name for the file type (for example, PDF, DOCX, ZIP).

params.name: fileSize
params.description: The physical size of the file including the units (for example, 2MB, 512KB).

params.name: fileExtent
params.description: The human-readable size of the file (for example, number of pages, duration).

params.name: icon
params.description: An optional Font Awesome icon, without the `fa-` prefix.

params.name: description
params.description: A short description of the file.

name: fullAreaClick
description: If `true`, allow users to click anywhere on one of the files to follow the link.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the files list.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the files list.
